textBox.richText: The “Blog” link in the navibar is absent from the Science page on purpose. My intent was to not have the science page and the blog directly linked. It is like a literal navigation throughout the entirety of my site. You have to travel back to the main hub to go to the other section. I will probably wind up posting a new science blog on the science page instead, like I said I was going to do, but haven’t gotten around to doing yet. The two parts of the site are separate, but are linked by a lifelong bond regardless. They are siblings of the same birth yet perform vastly different purposes. If you do not like my decision here then too bad. … Also yes the comment box seems to have become beheaded. I would assume it is a problem with the code for it; I dunno. I’ll fix it somehow eventually.
